sentences.en: Shop, library, launderette , computer suite, sports hall.
sentences.cn: 商店，图书馆，自动洗衣店，电脑房，运动馆。

sentences.en: You have not spoken to the owner before. the 1st launderette was purchased 10 years ago.
sentences.cn: 你还没有以前和所有者谈话。10年以前第1自助洗衣店被购买。

words.tran_cn: 洗衣店，洗衣房；要洗的衣服；洗熨；洗好的衣服

trans.tran_cn: （装有投币洗衣机的）自动洗衣店
trans.tran_en: a place where you can go to wash your clothes in machines that work when you put coins in them
